meanings.definition: A quantity that has the same ratio to a given quantity as another quantity.
meanings.sent1: In math class, we learned how to solve problems involving proportionals.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for two proportionals of water for every one part of rice.
meanings.sent3: The chef mistakenly added too many proportionals of salt to the soup.
meanings.sent4: The relationship between speed and time is an example of proportionals.
meanings.sent5: The tailor used proportionals to ensure the sleeves were the right length.
